title: Grow Up!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>It’s only April, but the sun is plenty strong already.... I wonder if it’s enough to cause sunburns.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>But this weather helps the flowers in the flowerbed to grow quickly. Come on, here’s your water~. Take a lot and bloom quickly~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Grow up, alright~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yoshiko-chan, your face is a bit red. Ruby can take care of the flowers myself, so why don’t you go find some shade?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh? We’re almost done anyway, so I’ll stay. My face is just red because, you know.... It’s hot.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Then how about we get some juice after we’re done watering?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Yeah, that sounds good.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Hmm, what should Ruby get? Strawberry or banana milk....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I’ll probably get either iced chocolate or a yogurt drink.... Hey, why don’t we get some ice cream instead?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ahaha, you’re right. Let’s get some ice cream!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
